FuncDef:
The display bgp vpn-instance peer command displays information about BGP peers in a specified VPN instance.
The display bgp vpn-instance slow-peer command displays information about slow BGP peers in a specified VPN instance. The display bgp vpn-instance peer command displays information about BGP peers in a specified VPN instance. The display bgp vpn-instance slow-peer command displays information about slow BGP peers in a specified VPN instance.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.

Specifies a BGP multi-instance address family.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp vpnv4 vpn-instance vrf1 peer
